videos.video_title: What are commodities?
videos.video_description: In this video, we go through the basics of commodities and commodities trading, exploring the different types in the market and how to trade them on Deriv.

videos.video_title: What is cryptocurrency?
videos.video_description: Learn the basics of cryptocurrency and crypto trading in our video. We also go through what makes crypto so secure and how you can trade it on Deriv.

videos.video_title: Introducing Deriv P2P
videos.video_description: In this video, find out how to get money in and out of your Deriv account easily with Deriv P2P, our peer-to-peer deposit and withdrawal service that helps you make easy p2p transfers with fellow traders.

videos.video_title: What are forex spreads?
videos.video_description: In this video, we go through what forex spreads are, how to calculate them, and why tight spreads are good for your trades.

videos.video_title: What is forex trading?
videos.video_description: Learn the basics of forex and forex trading in our video, including the different types of forex currency pairs, what forex basket indices are, and how you can trade forex on Deriv.

videos.video_title: How to trade commodities on Deriv X
videos.video_description: Watch our video to find out how to place a commodities CFD trade on Deriv X – a customisable multi-asset CFD trading platform.

videos.video_title: How to trade synthetics on Deriv X
videos.video_description: Trade synthetic indices on our highly customisable CFD trading platform. Watch this step-by-step guide to find out how to place your first trade.

videos.video_title: How to trade forex on Deriv X
videos.video_description: Follow our detailed step-by-step guide to know how to trade forex CFDs on Deriv X – a highly customisable CFD trading platform.

videos.video_title: What is margin?
videos.video_description: In CFD trading margin is a percentage of a trade value you need to pay to open a leveraged trade. Find out how it works and how you can calculate your margin in our video.

videos.video_title: How to trade cryptocurrencies on Deriv X
videos.video_description: Check out our video to learn how to place a crypto CFD trade on Deriv X – a CFD trading platform to fit your style.

videos.video_title: How to deposit and withdraw on Deriv X
videos.video_description: Find out how you can fund your Deriv X account to start trading and withdraw your funds out of it in a few simple steps.

videos.video_title: What is leverage?
videos.video_description: Leverage in a nutshell. Find out how you can open bigger trades with a small capital and how to protect your capital with risk management features.

videos.video_title: What is CFD trading?
videos.video_description: CFD trading explained. Find out what CFD stands for, benefits of the CFD trading, and platforms that offer it on Deriv.

videos.video_title: How to get started on Deriv X
videos.video_description: Find out the differences between the account types on Deriv X, and get to know how to create one on mobile and desktop to start trading CFDs.

videos.video_title: Introducing Deriv X – the highly customisable CFD trading platform
videos.video_description: Get to know Deriv X – a customisable CFD trading platform which you can personalise to suit your trading style.

videos.video_title: How to use take profit and stop loss on Crash/Boom indices
videos.video_description: Discover how take profit and stop loss work on Crash/Boom synthetic indices on Deriv.

videos.video_title: How to use the Deriv P2P app
videos.video_description: Find out how to create ads, and how to transfer funds in and out of your Deriv account via P2P payments.

videos.video_title: How to make a deposit via Skrill
videos.video_description: Find out how to make a deposit into your Deriv account via Skrill.

videos.video_title: How to place a Deriv multipliers trade
videos.video_description: A guide to placing your first multipliers trade on Deriv.

videos.video_title: How to make a withdrawal via Skrill
videos.video_description: Find out how to withdraw funds from your Deriv account via Skrill.
